1196.name: DSS Logistics Hub
1196.description: Parts for the Democracy Space Station are prefabricated all over the Galaxy, then shipped here to await assembly.

1197.name: Xenoentomology Center
1197.description: Those who study Terminid behavior, ecology and E-710 potential gather here for cross-disciplinary research.

1198.name: Deep Mantle Forge Complex
1198.description: The smelters and refineries on this planet turn crude materials into usable hardware.

1199.name: DSS Construction Site
1199.description: Democracy Space Station construction is well underway. The local economy is flourishing as the planet’s populace has centupled, and all the Galaxy can feel their democratic fervor.

1202.name: JET BRIGADE
1202.description: The Automatons have deployed a new series of specialized models on this planet. These upgraded bots utilize stolen Jump Pack technology, heartlessly pillaged from the bodies of fallen Helldivers and reverse-engineered into something nearly unrecognizeable.

1206.name: TERMINID RESEARCH PRESERVE
1206.description: Terminids are held safely within massive compounts on this planet for study and E-710 extraction.

1217.name: DEMOCRACY SPACE STATION
1217.description: A Helldiver-operated weapon of mass liberation. Paid for with the blood of soldiers and the credits of taxpayers, this technological marvel is Democracy made manifest.

1232.name: FACTORY HUB
1232.description: The hard workers on this planet produce goods vital to the war effort, as well as to the prosperity of Super Earth.

1234.name: CENTER OF SCIENCE
1234.description: On this planet, the Ministry of Science's best and brightest work on their next breakthrough.

1236.name: CENTER FOR CIVILIAN SURVEILLANCE AND SAFETY
1236.description: The Ministry of Truth analyzes citizens' activity, speech, data, DNA, RNA, and neural topology here.

1239.name: JET BRIGADE FACTORIES
1239.description: Vertically enhanced Jet Brigade soldiers are produced here.

1230.name: MERIDIAN BLACK HOLE
1230.description: The prosperous Meridia was corrupted into a Terminid Supercolony, necessitating its destruction using the mysterious Dark Fluid. This galactic scar is all that remains.

1240.name: VERGE OF DESTRUCTION
1240.description: This planet is under threat of destruction.

1241.name: FRACTURED PLANET
1241.description: All that remains of a planet torn apart by the Meridian singularity. A solemn reminder of the desolation Tyranny leaves in its wake.

1242.name: MOVING SINGULARITY
1242.description: The singluarity is moving and is estimated to impact Super Earth.

1245.name: PREDATOR STRAIN
1245.description: A Gloom-enhanced strain of Terminids has been reported on this planet. SEAF patrols have been lured into ambushes, and picked off by unseen assailants. Every ounce of a Helldiver's superior senses will be required to hunt down this dangerous threat.

1244.name: Spore Burst Strain
1244.description: A Gloom-enhanced strain of Terminids has been reported on this planet. They can explode into spores.

1249.name: INCINERATION CORPS
1249.description: An Automaton unit equipped with flame throwers and incendiary ammunition is active on this planet. These wanton arsonists will not rest until they have razed all that humankind holds dear.

1268.name: NEGATIVE ENERGY LABORATORY
1268.description: Scientists without fear of implosion or spaghettification study negative energy here.

1282.name: HELLDIVER TRAINING FACILITIES
1282.description: Here, the best of the best go through the rigorous Helldiver training that will earn them their capes.

1286.name: NEW HOPE CONSTRUCTION SITE
1286.description: One of 3 Maximum Security Cities is under construction here.

1287.name: NEW HOPE CITY
1287.description: The flagship Maximum Security City. Impregnable to Tyranny; the future of the Federation.

1291.name: NEW ASPIRATION CITY
1291.description: One of 3 Maximum Security Cities. Impregnable to Tyranny; the future of the Federation.

1292.name: NEW YEARNING CITY
1292.description: One of 3 Maximum Security Cities. Impregnable to Tyranny; the future of the Federation.

1295.name: TYRANNY PARK 2
1295.description: The extensive Terminid enclosures here allow scientists to study Terminid behavior, and civilians to take pictures with Brood Commanders.
